citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care.
citations.narrative:
On February 5, 2025, the death of a pig during an anesthetic event was reported to the Attending Veterinarian and
subsequently to the IACUC. The event occurred when the pig was being changed from positive pressure ventilation to
spontaneous ventilation. The pop off valve on the anesthetic machine was accidently left in the closed position. The pig
went into cardiac arrest while still under anesthesia and was unable to be resuscitated. Incorrect operation of anesthetic
machines can result in injury or death of the patient. Correct by ensuring that personnel providing anesthesia are properly
trained on the use of ventilators and anesthetic machines used in the research facility. Following the incident, the
veterinary staff reviewed the procedures for ventilation changes with the technical support staff. That review occurred
prior to today’s inspection.
Correct from April 8, 2025, onward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attending Veterinarian.
n

narrative:
2.33(b)(4)  Critical
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care. 
On February 5, 2025, the death of a pig during an anesthetic event was reported to the Attending Veterinarian and 
subsequently to the IACUC. The event occurred when the pig was being changed from positive pressure ventilation to 
spontaneous ventilation. The pop off valve on the anesthetic machine was accidently left in the closed position. The pig 
went into cardiac arrest while still under anesthesia and was unable to be resuscitated. Incorrect operation of anesthetic 
machines can result in injury or death of the patient. Correct by ensuring that personnel providing anesthesia are properly 
trained on the use of ventilators and anesthetic machines used in the research facility. Following the incident, the 
veterinary staff reviewed the procedures for ventilation changes with the technical support staff. That review occurred 
prior to today’s inspection. 
 
Correct from April 8, 2025, onward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Attending Veterinarian.
